title: LegenVD
description:
Magic the Gathering strategy videos with a focus on the digital Magic Arena.
This channel is supported by its fans on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: We're bringing Dinosaurs back!
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a black/red/green or Jund dinosaur reanimator deck, featuring Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant, Palani's Hatcher and Coiling Rebirth from Bloomburrow in Standard. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Deck Tech
05:05 - Match 1
11:22 - Match 2
18:37 - Match 3
21:48 - Match 4
25:47 - Match 5
29:59 - Match 6
36:05 - Match 7
38:39 - Match 8
41:13 - Match 9
